description.value:
Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Acid

Standard

Reach 2

+25 vs AC; 2d8+8 damage plus 3d6 acid damage. The elder copper dragon shifts 2 squares before and after making the attack.

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 2

+25 vs AC; 2d6+8 damage.

At-Will

Standard

The elder copper dragon makes two claw attacks and then shifts 3 squares.

At-Will

Standard

The elder copper dragon flies 14 squares and makes one melee basic attack at any point during that movement. The dragon doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when moving away from the target

At-Will

Immediate Reaction

Targets the triggering enemy

Trigger: When an enemy moves to a space where it flanks the elder copper dragon, at-will

+25 vs AC; 2d6+8 damage, and the copper dragon shifts 2 squares.

Recharge 4-6 ✦ Acid

Standard

Close blast 5

+21 vs Reflex; 3d10+6 acid damage, and the target is slowed (save ends). Miss: Half damage.

Encounter

Free

Trigger: When first bloodied, encounter

Breath weapon recharges, and the elder copper dragon uses it

Encounter ✦ Fear

Standard

Close burst 10

Targets enemies; +21 vs Will; the target is stunned until the end of the elder copper dragon's next turn. Aftereffect: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).
An elder copper dragon makes saving throws against immobilized, slowed, and restrained conditions at the start of its turn as well as at the end of its turn.
